import React from "react"; import { useRef } from 'react' import emailjs from '@emailjs/browser' import Workk from "./assets/work.jpg"; const Work = ()=>{ const refForm = useRef const sendEmail = (e) => { e.preventDefault() emailjs .sendForm('gmail', 'service_z1hokkj', refForm.current, 'wM15FAcxBSrQ0wzuZ') .then( () => { alert('Message successfully sent!') window.location.reload(false) }, () => { alert('Failed to send the message, please try again') } ) } return( <>
); } export default Work;
